DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Lung Effect Indacaterol Tiotropium Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis COPD ( moderatetosevere classify Global Initiative Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease ( GOLD ) Guidelines , 2007 ) : ) Smoking history least 10 packyears b ) Postbronchodilator force expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) < 80 % â‰¥ 30 % predict normal value c ) Postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC ( force vital capacity ) < 70 % Patients receive systemic corticosteroid antibiotic and/or hospitalize COPD exacerbation 6 week prior screen Patients respiratory tract infection within 6 week prior screen Patients concomitant pulmonary disease Patients history asthma Patients diabetes Type I uncontrolled diabetes Type II Any patient lung cancer history lung cancer Patients history certain cardiovascular comorbid condition Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion apply study .
